content: Maybe if you shared any error messages, that may help.
creator: davidsk

content:
WLM exports, or saves, mail as eml files. They can be imported to TB without an add-on:

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1422472

Export the WLM contacts to a csv file and import to TB from Tools/Import. Or, export to vCards, merge them into a single .vcf file, then import to TB.
creator: sfhowes

content: Sometimes view>fontsize and view>density options alleviate the problem.
creator: davidsk

content:
How did you change from POP to IMAP? It's not possible by just changing the settings - the account has to be added as an existing mail account with IMAP server type and settings.

http://kb.mozillazine.org/Convert_a_POP_account_to_a_IMAP_account
creator: sfhowes

content: It may have helped if you shared the details. Upgrading to 115 creates a new view and that can take time to adjust. My suggestion is to have a full profile backup and repeat the process, as version 102 is not coming back. 115 is still going through some growing pains, but I would not suggest staying on 102 more than a few months. I hope your next try is more successful.
creator: davidsk

content: I'm unclear on the problem. Are messages deleted from the server or from the PC? If this is a POP account, check the account server settings to review the number of days before deletion.
creator: davidsk

content: 1. Vypnite Thunderbird. Presvedčte sa ešte v Správcovi úloh že nie je spustený žiaden Thunderbird. Potom choďte do zložky s profilom Thunderbirdu a odstráňte súbor parent.lock https://support.mozilla.org/cs/kb/profily-thunderbirdu. 2. Ako to popisujete, tak problémy s emailami asi spôsobuje antivírusový program, alebo firewall.
creator: Ansamb

content: If the account isn't working on three devices, then something is wrong. And it might be the password. Logging in to paypal is not proof, since paypal is not logging on to your email account; it's just using the email id as your access to paypal.
creator: davidsk

content: Thanks for the reply David, No buysell.com it is not my e-mail address. Every e-mail I try to send or answer keeps coming up with " Relay access denied. Please check the message recipient "" and try again Any further help would be apreciated Sue
creator: sue.evans

content: Is info@buysellcyprus.com your actual email address, or is this an alias for the real address? I ask because SMTP servers will reject an email id that isn't recognized as a legitimate user. This can also happen for other reasons, but checking SMTP settings would be my first check.
creator: davidsk

content:
Se nella colonna Tipo di contenuto trovi elencate le estensioni di Excel, allora facendo click nella corrispondente cella della colonna Azione dovrei poter associare il programma.

Se il contenuto invece è solo quello visibile in foto, Thunderbird non vede Excel o non ne riconosce le estensioni. Ma su Mac non saprei come risolvere.

Nel caso puoi anche provare a chiedere su -> https://forum.mozillaitalia.org/
creator: @next

content:
Kedves Balázs! Köszönöm a segítséged! Sajnos nálam egyik megoldás sem megy. Az "Új üzenet" mellett nincs 3 pont és nem is tudom úgy testreszabni, hogy megjelenjen, a "letöltés" jobb egérre meg csak a "testreszabás" jelenik meg. Mellékeltem képernyőképet. Mi a véleményed?

Előre is köszönöm.

Üdv: Honti György
creator: honti

content:
Kedves György!

Valószínűleg a helyi mappák csak el lettek rejtve. Kattints az Új üzenet gomb melletti három pontos gombra, és kapcsold ki a Helyi mappák elrejtése beállítást.

A letöltés gomb valóban megváltozott, a lenyíló menü, amit eddig a nyílra kattintva lehetett előhozni, most már a jobb egérgombra nyílik meg.

Üdv, Balázs
creator: meskobalazs

content: Seems that this is triggered by the "QuickFolders" extension. I disabled all my TBird extensions, and then re-enabled them one by one. With all disabled, the "null" text disappeared, and stayed away as all other extensions were re-enabled, but when I re-enabled QuickFolders, the "null" text returned.
creator: doug-TBird
